short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to display internal links on a webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Internal Links Bold Extension is a user-friendly Chrome extension that pops up with a beautiful interface whenever clicked. It conveniently displays all the internal links found on the current webpage, providing easy access to internal content. Discover and explore relevant resources without leaving the page.
